languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next turn. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Авангард{/g} получает +<u>(10 + 2 × число уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}")</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} до следующего хода. Парируя вражескую атаку, авангард немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против того же врага со штрафом −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Vanguard gains +<u>10+2×(number of unyielding beacon stacks)%</u> parry until their next turn. Whenever the Vanguard Parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an attack of opportunity with a -20 penalty to Weapon Skill against that enemy.

The Vanguard gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of unyielding beacon stacks)</u>% parry until their next turn. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an attack of opportunity with a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill against that enemy.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next turn. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Авангард получает +<u>(10 + 2 × число уровней знака стойкости)</u>% к парированию до следующего хода. Парируя вражескую атаку, авангард немедленно совершает атаку по возможности против того же врага со штрафом −20 к Ближнему Бою.

Авангард получает +<u>(10 + 2 × число уровней знака стойкости)</u>% к парированию до следующего хода. Парируя вражескую атаку, авангард немедленно совершает атаку по возможности против того же врага со штрафом −20 к Ближнему Бою.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数）</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。每当先锋招架敌人的攻击时，都会立刻对该名敌人发起一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，但此次借机攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}武器技能{/g}会降低20点。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}{/g}
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: 先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}层数）</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。每当先锋招架敌人的攻击时，都会立刻对该名敌人发起一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，但此次借机攻击会遭受-20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana un +<u>(10 + 2 × cantidad de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada vez que el vanguardia pare un ataque enemigo, realiza inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} contra ese enemigo.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: El vanguardia gana un +<u>(10 + 2 × cantidad de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada vez que el vanguardia pare un ataque enemigo, realiza inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} contra ese enemigo.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} erlangt +<u>(10 + 2× Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}-Additionen)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} bis zu ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Wann immer die Vorhut einen feindlichen Angriff pariert, führt sie umgehend einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind aus, und zwar mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Die Vorhut erlangt +<u>(10 + 2× Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}-Stapeln)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} bis zu ihrer nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}. Wann immer die Vorhut einen feindlichen Angriff pariert, führt sie umgehend einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind aus, und zwar mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +<u>(10 + 2 × nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Chaque fois le Patrouilleur pare l'attaque d'un ennemi, il lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre cet ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 sur la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Le Patrouilleur bénéficie de +<u>(10 + 2 × nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Lorsque le Patrouilleur pare l'attaque d'un ennemi, il lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre cet ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20 sur la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +<u>(10 + 2 × nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Lorsque le Patrouilleur pare l'attaque d'un ennemi, il lance immédiatement une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre cet ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 sur la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数)</u>%される。ヴァンガードが敵の攻撃を受け流した時、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}に−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +<u>(10 + 2 × number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until their next turn. Whenever the Vanguard parries an enemy's attack, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} against that enemy.

traits.locale_text: ヴァンガードは、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数)</u>%される。ヴァンガードが敵の攻撃を受け流した時、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}に-20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。
